author: Blake Schuster
title: Eagles' Jeffrey Lurie Donating $1M to Penn Medicine Research During COVID-19
description: Philadelphia Eagles  owner Jeffrey Lurie has  donated  $1 million to Penn Medicine to fund COVID-19 testing and research...
content:
Matt Rourke/Associated Press
Philadelphia Eagles owner Jeffrey Lurie has donated $1 million to Penn Medicine to fund COVID-19 testing and research. 
The money will directly go toward establishing the COVID-19 Immunology Defense Fund, according to a release … [+1270 chars]
